snippet.title: Hidden In Plain Sight -- Game Trailer
snippet.description:
FAQ:  http://adamspragggames.blogspot.com/2013/07/hidden-in-plain-sight-faq-1.html
Learn more about this game here:  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=72XXzdVP26g

Hidden in Plain Sight is a local multiplayer game where players must use cunning and guile in order to win.  Players can eliminate each other from the game, so you must blend in with your surroundings and accomplish your goals without calling attention to yourself.

Try to win, but don't LOOK like you're trying to win... or you'll lose.
